overview.base: Your mouth counts as a weapon for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by it (although it cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may attack with it and its damage die is now [[/damage 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/damage 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/damage 1d8]].

overview.base: Target is blind.

system.endCondition: At the end of each of the target's turns, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. If either of these dice roll a 4, this effect ends.

overview.base: Harsh conditions or long exertions do not easily tire you. You have advantage on all saves or checks made to against exhaustion, running out of breath, starvation, thirst, heat, and cold.
You gain Beastly Strength and Improved Armor Piercing.

Can wield two-handed weapons in one hand.
Note: AP weapons must still be wielded in two hands to be AV0.
Melee weapons you use are armor piercing.
You gain Offensive Martial Arts and Defensive Martial Arts.

Your hands count as weapons for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by (although they cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may attack with them and their damage die is now [[/damage 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/damage 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/damage 1d8]].

overview.base:
Your hands count as shields for the purposes of abilities that target them (although they cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may block with them and their BV is +1.
Note: This does not make your hands blocking.
You gain Mountain ResilienceandLimited Agile.
You deboost damage caused by mountainousweather.
You walk through difficult terrain at normal speed.
You always have at least 1 AV. This is the case even when you are not wearing armor.
You cannot use items in your hands.
